attributes.action: The Gas and Electricity companies to reduce the charges in line with fall in prices of Crude oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gas and Electricity companies were fast to increase their levies when the crude prices went up. Why are they not reducing their tarriffs now. These companies are not bothering to pass on the steep reduction in costs. Last time they increased their price crude was at USD 150 a barrel. Now it is almost 1/3 of that. Why don't we see that same reduction?
